授業目的: The aim of this course is to acquaint students the nature and causes of the post-war economic development, which is sometimes referred to “miracle”, of the recent serious slump, which is now called “lost decades”, and of current economic challenges in Japan.
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand
(1) Basis of Japanese economic development in modern era,
(2) Nature and causes of post-war Japanese economic development, and
(3) Japanese “lost decades”, and current economic challenges.
授業方法:
According to the lecture notes, I will explain about how the Japanese economy has developed in the modern era. Using simple models, figures and data. I try to develop intuitive explanations for the students to deepen their understanding of the Japanese economy in general.
* Classes will be conducted online in real time.
* The students are expected to read the lecture notes (Power Point Slides) in advance.

第3回:
3. Rapid Economic Growth Period
4. Low (or Steady) Growth Period

7. Understanding Bubble Economy
8. Burst of Bubbles in Japan
